mapper.select:
SELECT A.SQNO , CASE WHEN A.BZCD = '999' THEN '프로젝트관리' ELSE B.BZNM END AS BZNM , A.FILE_RGS_DSCD , A.SAH_FILE_NM , A.FILE_NM , A.ORG_FILE_NM , A.SAM_FILE_NM , A.FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT A.SQNO , B.BZCD , A.FILE_RGS_DSCD , CONCAT(B.PGM_ID,':',B.PGM_NM) AS SAH_FILE_NM , A.FILE_NM , A.ORG_FILE_NM , CONCAT(A.PRJT_ID,'_',B.BZCD,'_구현_단위테스트케이스(',B.PGM_ID,')_v.1.0_',DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_CHG_TS,'%Y%m%d'),'.',SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.FILE_NM,'.',-1) ) AS SAM_FILE_NM , A.FILE_PATH FROM pms_atfl_mng A INNER JOIN pms_pgm_mng B ON B.ATFL_MNG_ID = A.ATFL_MNG_ID AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND B.BZCD = CASE WHEN #{bzcd} = 'TTT' THEN B.BZCD ELSE #{bzcd} END WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '100' AND #{file_rgs_dscd} IN ('TTT','100') UNION ALL SELECT A.SQNO , B.BZCD , A.FILE_RGS_DSCD , CONCAT(B.PGM_ID,':',B.PGM_NM) AS SAH_FILE_NM , A.FILE_NM , A.ORG_FILE_NM , CASE WHEN B.PGM_DIS_CD = '100' THEN CONCAT(A.PRJT_ID,'_',B.BZCD,'_설계_화면설계서(',B.PGM_ID,')_v.1.0_',DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_CHG_TS,'%Y%m%d'),'.',SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.FILE_NM,'.',-1) ) WHEN B.PGM_DIS_CD = '200' THEN CONCAT(A.PRJT_ID,'_',B.BZCD,'_설계_프로그램설계서(',B.PGM_ID,')_v.1.0_',DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_CHG_TS,'%Y%m%d'),'.',SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.FILE_NM,'.',-1) ) WHEN B.PGM_DIS_CD = '300' THEN CONCAT(A.PRJT_ID,'_',B.BZCD,'_설계_보고서설계서(',B.PGM_ID,')_v.1.0_',DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_CHG_TS,'%Y%m%d'),'.',SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.FILE_NM,'.',-1) ) WHEN B.PGM_DIS_CD = '400' THEN CONCAT(A.PRJT_ID,'_',B.BZCD,'_설계_배치프로그램설계서(',B.PGM_ID,')_v.1.0_',DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_CHG_TS,'%Y%m%d'),'.',SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.FILE_NM,'.',-1) ) ELSE '' END AS SAM_FILE_NM , A.FILE_PATH FROM pms_atfl_mng A INNER JOIN pms_pgm_mng B ON B.PAL_ATFL_MNG_ID = A.ATFL_MNG_ID AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND B.BZCD = CASE WHEN #{bzcd} = 'TTT' THEN B.BZCD ELSE #{bzcd} END WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '101' AND #{file_rgs_dscd} IN ('TTT','101') UNION ALL SELECT A.SQNO , B.BZCD , A.FILE_RGS_DSCD , CONCAT(B.PGM_ID,':',B.PGM_ID) AS SAH_FILE_NM , A.FILE_NM , A.ORG_FILE_NM , CONCAT(A.PRJT_ID,'_',B.BZCD,'_테스트_통합테스트_케이스(결과)_v.1.0_',DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_CHG_TS,'%Y%m%d'),'.',SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.FILE_NM,'.',-1)) AS SAM_FILE_NM , A.FILE_PATH FROM pms_atfl_mng A INNER JOIN pms_itg_tst_mng B ON B.ATFL_MNG_ID = A.ATFL_MNG_ID AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND B.BZCD = CASE WHEN #{bzcd} = 'TTT' THEN B.BZCD ELSE #{bzcd} END WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '200' AND #{file_rgs_dscd} IN ('TTT','200') UNION ALL SELECT A.SQNO , '999' AS BZCD , A.FILE_RGS_DSCD , '프로젝트관리' AS SAH_FILE_NM , A.FILE_NM , A.ORG_FILE_NM , '' AS SAM_FILE_NM , A.FILE_PATH FROM pms_atfl_mng A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.FILE_RGS_DSCD = CASE WHEN #{file_rgs_dscd} = 'TTT' THEN A.FILE_RGS_DSCD ELSE #{file_rgs_dscd} END AND #{file_rgs_dscd} IN ('TTT','900','901','902') ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DTLS_TYCD AS BZCD , DTLS_TYNM AS BZNM FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE GRP_TYCD = '1000000001' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} ) B ON B.BZCD = A.BZCD WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.SAH_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sah_file_nm}, '%')
ORDER BY A.FILE_RGS_DSCD, A.SAH_FILE_NM, SQNO
